tournament.name: British Quidditch Cup 2022
tournament.location: Sheffield Hallam University Sports Park, Bawtry Rd, Tinsley, Sheffield S9 1UA
tournament.details:
Both our University and Community divisions will be in attendance within their own ‘flights’ throughout the tournament, meaning that for the first time ever TWO national champions will be crowned within their respective divisions. Clubs will need to fight it out to prove that they should be the ones taking the trophy home! Who will succeed this year?

BQC is finally back and will be calling for ‘Brooms Up!’ on April 9th-10th at the Sheffield Hallam Sports Park. Player and Volunteer registration closes on Monday 4th April with final roster confirmations in before Thursday 7th April.

*Not all things are 100% perfect, however we’re banking on this tournament to be with both sides of the UK Quidditch community pulling out all the stops to make this the best BQC yet!
